  • Method Details

    • downloadArtifactFileByReference

      public ReferencesApi.DownloadArtifactFileByReferenceAdapter downloadArtifactFileByReference(String artifactHrn, String fileName, Optional<String> apiKey)
      Downloads artifact file using API Key authentication. Reference access must be granted to the artifact before this endpoint can be used. The calling principal must have \"readResource\" permission to the artifact in order to retrieve the file. In addition to API Key, this API supports tokens with or without a project scope.

      Path: /references/{artifactHrn}/{fileName}

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : Array[Byte] (Successfully retrieved artifact file)

      code 401 : (You are not authorized to view the resource)

      code 403 : (Accessing the resource is forbidden)

      code 404 : (The resource you were trying to access was not found)

      code 500 : ErrorResponse (Internal server error. Support ticket should be created)

      Parameters:
      artifactHrn - The HRN of the artifact
      fileName - The path to artifact file
      apiKey - API Key token used for request authentication

    • downloadArtifactFileByReference

      public ReferencesApi.DownloadArtifactFileByReferenceBuilder downloadArtifactFileByReference()

    • getReferenceAccessState

      public ReferencesApi.GetReferenceAccessStateAdapter getReferenceAccessState(String artifactHrn)
      Check that specified artifact has API key access enabled. The calling principal must have \"readResource\" permission to the artifact in order to use this endpoint.

      Path: /references/{artifactHrn}

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : ApiKeyAccessStateResponse (Successfully retrieved API key access state)

      code 401 : (You are not authorized to view the resource)

      code 403 : (Accessing the resource is forbidden)

      code 404 : (The resource you were trying to access was not found)

      code 500 : ErrorResponse (Internal server error. Support ticket should be created)

      Parameters:
      artifactHrn - The HRN of the artifact

    • getReferenceAccessState

      public ReferencesApi.GetReferenceAccessStateBuilder getReferenceAccessState()

    • grantReferenceAccess

      public ReferencesApi.GrantReferenceAccessAdapter grantReferenceAccess(String artifactHrn)
      Grants API Key access to the artifact. This allows any principal that has \"readResource\" permission to the artifact to use the \"references\" API to download artifact files using API Access Key instead of the Bearer Token authorization. The calling principal must have \"shareResource\" permission to the artifact in order to use this endpoint. This API works for tokens with or without a project scope.

      Path: /references/{artifactHrn}

      Method: PUT

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : ApiKeyAccessStateResponse (Successfully granted API Key access)

      code 401 : (You are not authorized to view the resource)

      code 403 : (Accessing the resource is forbidden)

      code 404 : (The resource you were trying to access was not found)

      code 500 : ErrorResponse (Internal server error. Support ticket should be created)

      Parameters:
      artifactHrn - The HRN of the artifact

    • grantReferenceAccess

      public ReferencesApi.GrantReferenceAccessBuilder grantReferenceAccess()

    • revokeReferenceAccess

      public ReferencesApi.RevokeReferenceAccessAdapter revokeReferenceAccess(String artifactHrn)
      Revokes API Key access from the artifact. This removes the ability to use the \"references\" API to download artifact files using API Access Key. The calling principal must have \"shareResource\" permission to the artifact in order to use this endpoint. This API works for tokens with or without a project scope.

      Path: /references/{artifactHrn}

      Method: DELETE

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : ApiKeyAccessStateResponse (Successfully revoked API Key access)

      code 401 : (You are not authorized to view the resource)

      code 403 : (Accessing the resource is forbidden)

      code 404 : (The resource you were trying to access was not found)

      code 500 : ErrorResponse (Internal server error. Support ticket should be created)

      Parameters:
      artifactHrn - The HRN of the artifact

    • revokeReferenceAccess

      public ReferencesApi.RevokeReferenceAccessBuilder revokeReferenceAccess()

    • withConfig

      public ReferencesApi withConfig(ApiConfiguration apiConfig)
